channel.title: [TuT]Making A Client[TuT]
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Making Your OWN Client[/size] This is my first TuT so Plz dont flame if i did bad :eek:
[size=20pt]@NOTE@I Know That This Is Posted Many Many Times Before.. BUT No Tutorial (As I Have Seen) Have This With@NOTE@[/size]
Diff: 1/1000000000000000000000 Trust Me Any Noob Can Do This!!!! :) :) :) Purpose: Helping Ppl Making Their OWN Client
Okay first of all.. are we going to need a client base (I'll be using Richscape client v4.1)
So If Thats Your Plan To, Then Heres The Dl Link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=ULWX4A2A
Okay now as we got our client base.. lets start
And we will start by edting the client background
[b][i][u]Chaper one - Making The Client BackGround[/u][/i][/b]
1.open up ur client and find your clients background (if you are using richscape client the PICTURE file will be called 'richscape' anyways open it and just edit the picture the way you want. (mine ended up by lookin like this) [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/24ecidx.jpg[/img] now to flip your image as it wont look like SHIT when you run the client u just gotta open it (with paint) and then find the middle of the picture and then do like this [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/11ljw9h.jpg[/img] then right click and click 'Flip/Rotate (Or SomeThing) then there should pop-up a menu just click ok to that without changing ANYTHING then your picture should be flipped :D now save your changes.
[b][i][u]Chapter Two - Changing The Scipts[/u][/i][/b]
1.open up client.java in your server's folder.. then change all the EX: RichScape's to *Your Server's Name* then after all of that save your changes and open up Frame_sub1 and search for EX: RichScape Client Made By Swat & Rich. and change it to whatever you want. That was chapter two - nice and easy just something for you huh?
[b][i][u]Chapter Three - Changing The Clients Text Colors! - Optional[/u][/i][/b] This Is Not A Needed Part.
1.open up client.java and search for EX: @whi@Log In (the @whi@ means that the text is going to be written in white) you can always change the color and the text EX: If i would like there to stand 'Enter Game' in red then i just had to do this @red@Enter Game and then the color (and the text) is changed. @NOTE@To Change The Color Of Something Like Text Just Add @*First Three Letters Of The Color*@
[b][i][u]Chapter Four - Making The Client Reconigze A New Name Of The Background picture!!![/u][/i][/b] Okay First open up Class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 Then Search for this: [code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage[/code] then you should see something like [code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(''richscape.jpg'');[/code] now change the richscape to EX: Vimsies-Anarchy BUT keep The .jpg intact then save your changes and compile
[size=15pt]Now For Two Things That Never Been Added To This Kinda Tutorial Yet - Untill Now[/size]
[b][i][u]Chapter Five - Changing What Stands In The Run.bat [/u][/i][/b] okay this is never seen before!!!! To change wat stands in the run.bat u just gotta open the run.bat and then copy something from it like EX:Richscape Client - Made By Swat & Rich - Most Credits To Swat. then open up class42.java press ctrl+b and then paste in Richscape Client - Made By Swat & Rich - Most Credits To Swat. and then change it to whatever you want there to be!!!!!
[b][i][u]Chapter Six - Fixing Messed Up Models[/u][/i][/b] this is made as u can fix your models.. cuz now your server and your client dont got the same models so to fix it open up ur clients class8.java and then if the fighter torso is glicthed then search for fighter torso in the class8.java then change the ID of it to the same ID like in your server. you can do this with any item... now save the changes and compile..
[size=24pt]Gratz U know got ya Very own Client!!!!![/size] now for some credits
0.5% to him that made the FIRST client ever... the rest 99.5 goes to me.. if any questions (or if u feel left outta the credits) just comment or pm
comment even if u dont got questions or complains. :D :D :D

item.title: [TuT]Making A Client[TuT]
item.dc:creator: @B_U_L_L_D_O_G B U L L D O G
item.description:
@B_U_L_L_D_O_G wrote:

[size=24pt]Making Your OWN Client[/size]
This is my first TuT so Plz dont flame if i did bad :eek:

[size=20pt]@NOTE@I Know That This Is Posted Many Many Times Before… BUT No Tutorial (As I Have Seen) Have This With@NOTE@[/size]

Diff: 1/1000000000000000000000 Trust Me Any Noob Can Do This!!!
Purpose: Helping Ppl Making Their OWN Client

Okay first of all…
are we going to need a client base (I’ll be using Richscape client v4.1)

So If Thats Your Plan To, Then Heres The Dl Link:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=ULWX4A2A

Okay now as we got our client base…
lets start

And we will start by edting the client background

Chaper one - Making The Client BackGround

1.open up ur client and find your clients background
(if you are using richscape client the PICTURE file will be called ‘richscape’ anyways open it and just edit the picture the way you want.
(mine ended up by lookin like this)

24ecidx.jpg856×524

now to flip your image as it wont look like SHIT when you run the client u just gotta open it (with paint)
and then find the middle of the picture and then do like this
11ljw9h.jpg828×508

then right click and click 'Flip/Rotate (Or SomeThing) then there should pop-up a menu just click ok to that without changing ANYTHING then your picture should be flipped
now save your changes.

Chapter Two - Changing The Scipts

1.open up client.java in your server’s folder…
then change all the EX: RichScape’s to Your Server’s Name
then after all of that save your changes and open up Frame_sub1
and search for EX: RichScape Client Made By Swat & Rich.
and change it to whatever you want. That was chapter two - nice and easy just something for you huh?

Chapter Three - Changing The Clients Text Colors! - Optional
This Is Not A Needed Part.

1.open up client.java and search for EX: @whi@Log In (the @whi@ means that the text is going to be written in white) you can always change the color and the text EX: If i would like there to stand ‘Enter Game’ in red then i just had to do this
@red@Enter Game
and then the color (and the text) is changed.
@NOTE@To Change The Color Of Something Like Text Just Add @First Three Letters Of The Color@

Chapter Four - Making The Client Reconigze A New Name Of The Background picture!!!
Okay First open up Class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 Then Search for this:

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage

then you should see something like

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(''richscape.jpg'');

now change the richscape to EX: Vimsies-Anarchy BUT keep The .jpg intact
then save your changes and compile

[size=15pt]Now For Two Things That Never Been Added To This Kinda Tutorial Yet - Untill Now[/size]

Chapter Five - Changing What Stands In The Run.bat
okay this is never seen before!!!
To change wat stands in the run.bat u just gotta open the run.bat and then copy something from it like EX:Richscape Client - Made By Swat & Rich - Most Credits To Swat.
then open up class42.java
press ctrl+b and then paste in Richscape Client - Made By Swat & Rich - Most Credits To Swat. and then change it to whatever you want there to be!!!

Chapter Six - Fixing Messed Up Models
this is made as u can fix your models…
cuz now your server and your client dont got the same models so to fix it open up ur clients class8.java and then if the fighter torso is glicthed then search for fighter torso in the class8.java then change the ID of it to the same ID like in your server.
you can do this with any item…
now save the changes and compile…

[size=24pt]Gratz U know got ya Very own Client!!![/size]
now for some credits

0.5% to him that made the FIRST client ever…
the rest 99.5 goes to me…
if any questions (or if u feel left outta the credits)
just comment or pm

comment even if u dont got questions or complains.

Read full topic
